entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
